Game.Name: Boboboubo Boubobo - 9 Kyoku Senshi Gag Yuugou (Japan)
Game.plot: Boboboubo Boubobo:9 Kiwame Senshi Gyagu Yuugou is a Role-Playing game, published by Hudson,which was released in Japan in 2004.Cheat: Use special moves with an empty Hajike barIt is actually possible to start a special move without any Hajike, but after it starts, it will instantly end.In order to do it, fight an enemy with a Hajike-emptying attack (Such as OVER) Then, open up a character's special moves menu. Wait until your opponent uses their Hajike-emptying attack, and immediatly afterwards, use one of your character's special moves. The character will start the attack, but it will end immediately after it begins.
